segments.text: This makes me smile, the kids plotting their cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's determination as he climbs that stool is adorable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching right into the jar, success in sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so eager, hand outstretched for her reward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the stool is leaning, oh that could end badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the mom is lost in drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water from the sink is flooding out, what a waste.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's stepped right into the puddle without a flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden view is lovely, flowers and all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how domestic this feels, even with the mishaps.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The apron on her adds to the charm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Hopefully the kids get their cookies without a crash.
segments.speaker: PAR
